definition: the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
details:
noun
- the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
= synonyms: substance
- a single whole grain of a cereal
= example: a single whole grain of a cereal
- the inner and usually edible part of a seed or grain or nut or fruit stone
= example: the inner and usually edible part of a seed or grain or nut or fruit stone
= synonyms: meat
